pricing.headline: Completely Free. No lock-in.
pricing.subtitle: Initia is open-source and free to use. Generate code, download it, and own it.
pricing.title: Free Forever

privacy.disclaimer: Note: This page is provided for informational purposes and does not constitute legal advice.

children.text: Initia is not intended for children under the age required by applicable law to consent to data processing. If you believe a child has provided us data, contact us to request deletion.
children.title: Children’s privacy

contact.text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or want to request access, deletion, or correction, contact us using the details below.
contact.title: Contact us

bullets.analytics: Analytics cookies (optional): help us understand usage patterns to improve the service.
bullets.essential: Essential cookies: required for authentication, security, and core functionality.
bullets.preferences: Preference cookies: remember settings like language or UI options.

cookies.text: We use cookies and similar technologies to keep you signed in, protect sessions, and improve the product. You can control cookies through your browser settings and (where available) our cookie controls.
cookies.title: Cookies & tracking

bullets.auth: Authenticate you and manage your account (including Google Sign-In).
bullets.communicate: Send important service updates (e.g., security notices, major changes) when necessary.
bullets.improve: Improve performance, reliability, and user experience.
bullets.provide: Provide the core functionality: schema review, generation steps, and delivering downloadable code.
bullets.security: Prevent abuse, protect against fraud, and maintain platform security.

howWeUse.text: We use collected information to operate the service and keep it secure:
howWeUse.title: How we use your information

international.text: Our infrastructure or service providers may process data outside Jordan. Where this happens, we take reasonable steps to ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.
international.title: International transfers

bullets.consent: Consent: for optional cookies or communications where required.
bullets.contract: Contractual necessity: to provide the service you request.
bullets.legitimate: Legitimate interests: to secure and improve the platform.

legalBases.text: Depending on your location and applicable laws, our processing may be based on:
legalBases.title: Legal basis (where applicable)

retention.text: We keep personal data only as long as necessary for providing the service, complying with legal obligations, resolving disputes, and enforcing our policies. We may retain aggregated or anonymized analytics for longer.
retention.title: Data retention

security.text: We use reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data (e.g., access controls, encryption in transit where supported, secure authentication). However, no system is 100% secure.
security.title: Security

bullets.google: Google authentication: when you choose Google Sign-In, authentication is handled through Google’s OAuth flow.
bullets.legal: Legal compliance: if required by law, court order, or to protect rights and safety.
bullets.noSell: No selling: we do not sell your data or share it for third-party advertising purposes.
bullets.providers: Service providers: hosting, logging, analytics, and email services that help us operate Initia (under appropriate safeguards).

sharing.text: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information only in limited cases:
sharing.title: Sharing your information

bullets.account: Account information: name, email address, password (hashed), and basic profile data you submit.
bullets.cookies: Cookies and similar technologies: used for session management, security, preferences, and analytics (where enabled).
bullets.generated: Generated project inputs: prompts, schema data, and project settings you submit for generating code (we aim to minimize storage and keep it only as needed to deliver the service).
bullets.oauth: Google Sign-In data: your Google account email and public profile details made available to us by Google (depending on your permissions).
bullets.usage: Usage and device data: IP address, browser type, pages visited, timestamps, and diagnostic logs.

whatWeCollect.text: We collect information to provide and improve the service. Depending on how you use Initia, this may include:
whatWeCollect.title: Information we collect

whoWeAre.text: Initia is a free, open-source service based in Jordan that helps you generate full-stack application code. We operate the website and the app generation workflow, including account login and Google Sign-In.
whoWeAre.title: Who we are

bullets.access: Request access to the personal data we hold about you.
bullets.correct: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information.
bullets.delete: Request deletion of your account and associated data (subject to legal requirements).
bullets.withdraw: Withdraw consent for optional cookies or communications where applicable.

yourRights.text: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal data. You can usually:
yourRights.title: Your rights & choices

privacy.subtitle: This Privacy Policy explains how Initia collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our website and services.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

terms.disclaimer: This Terms of Service document is provided for informational purposes and does not constitute legal advice.

acceptance.text: By accessing or using Initia, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, you may not use the service.
acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms

accounts.text: Some features require creating an account or signing in using third-party authentication providers such as Google. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.
accounts.title: Accounts & Authentication

availability.text: The service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We may modify, suspend, or discontinue parts of the service at any time.
availability.title: Service Availability

changes.text: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the service after changes indicates acceptance of the updated Terms.
changes.title: Changes to These Terms

contact.text: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us.
contact.title: Contact

disclaimer.text: Initia is provided without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that generated code is error-free, secure, or fit for a particular purpose.
disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties

generatedCode.text: You retain ownership of the source code generated for you. Initia does not claim ownership over your generated projects.
generatedCode.title: Generated Code Ownership

governingLaw.text: These Terms are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan.
governingLaw.title: Governing Law

limitation.text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Initia and its maintainers shall not be liable for any damages arising from your use of the service or generated code.
limitation.title: Limitation of Liability

openSource.text: Initia is provided as an open-source project. The platform itself and generated output may be governed by open-source licenses specified in the repository or generated files.
openSource.title: Open-Source Nature

service.text: Initia is a free, open-source platform that generates full-stack application code based on user input. The service includes schema visualization, project configuration, and downloadable source code.
service.title: The Service

termination.text: We may suspend or terminate access to the service if these Terms are violated or if continued operation becomes impractical.
termination.title: Termination

usage.text: You agree not to misuse the service, interfere with its operation, attempt unauthorized access, or use Initia for unlawful or harmful purposes.
usage.title: Acceptable Use

terms.subtitle: These Terms govern your access to and use of Initia and its services.
terms.title: Terms of Service
